page.title: 20Acknowledgements
page.content: We should like to thank very much all those who helped and contributed to our Domesday project;the farmers who replied to our letters or gave information by phone; to M.Milnes of BRSA; to Mr and Mrs Franks of Walnuts Farm, who welcomed a group of children to their farm;also to Davern Workwears Mr Burns and Mrs Foreman for the tour of the factory; to Mr C.Fox boatmaker and Mr & Mrs C.Bedford for information on bikes;also to Mr Ivill for letting us be the planning committee;to the library for lending us their maps;to Dr P.Langton, the Revd B.Ruddock, Mr R.Richmond,for their talks;Mr Hamilton for the visit to NWCC,to Mr Manning for photographs,and to parents and pupils of Neale Wade for help on visits. The survey was made by Classes 4 and 5,Mrs J.Potter and Mrs H.Hewitt.
